snippet: The California racetrack will host the 2017 Breeders’ Cup, but its summer meet has been troubled by a series of calamities, including the deaths of five horses on the newly installed turf course.
abstract: Summer meet at California's Del Mar racetrack has been troubled by a series of calamities, including the deaths of twelve horses, suspensions for animal abuse and a trailer fire; track's newly installed turf, on which five horses have died after breaking down, has drawn particular scrutiny.
lead_paragraph: The California racetrack will host the 2017 Breeders’ Cup, but its summer meet has been troubled by a series of calamities, including the deaths of five horses on the newly installed turf course.

headline.main: Scrutiny Circles Track at Del Mar
headline.print_headline: Scrutiny Circles Track at Del Mar
